text: Ara iyahudi o nasarara apanara prati kakhano santusta habe na, yataksana na apani tadera millatera anusarana karena. Baluna niscaya allah‌ra ‘hidayata’i prakrta ‘hidayata’. Ara apanara kache jnana asara para'o yadi apani tadera kheyala-khusira anusarana karena, tabe allah‌ra paksa theke apanara kono abhibhabaka thakabe na ebam thakabe na kono sahayyakari'o
